data.name: UsageLine0
data.value: WoWsTexComp - by IsamuKondera 2021

data.name: UsageLine1
data.value: Version 1.0

data.name: UsageLine10
data.value: -o -O <path> Path to the Zip directory

data.name: UsageLine11
data.value: -z -Z <name> Zip Filename

data.name: UsageLine12
data.value: Additional Information:

data.name: UsageLine13
data.value: * This tool only supports direct paths!

data.name: UsageLine14
data.value: * To zip the scaled images, provide either option -o or -o and -z!

data.name: UsageLine15
data.value: * Can be used to scale user mods as well! For this provide the option -n for not extracting a file and provide the path to the mod via -e

data.name: UsageLine2
data.value: usage: wowstexcomp.exe [OPTIONS...]

data.name: UsageLine3
data.value: Options:

data.name: UsageLine4
data.value: -h -H Show this help

data.name: UsageLine5
data.value: -n -N Do not extract files

data.name: UsageLine6
data.value: -e -E <path> Path for extractor output

data.name: UsageLine7
data.value: -g -G <path> Path to your World of Warships installation

data.name: UsageLine8
data.value: -s -S <scale> Scale in decimal e.g. 0.25 => 25%

data.name: UsageLine9
data.value: -w -W <path> Path to the directory where this tool will place all scaled files
